The film has grossed over $100 million worldwide, $70 million in the US and Canada, and $30 million in the rest of the world, surpassing its production costs and becoming the highest-grossing film in the Kung Fu Panda franchise at its opening. However, Po's lack of leadership skills and his need to find and train a new Dragon Warrior quickly presents a challenge. Kung Fu Panda 4 will be released in Colombian cinemas on March 14, 2024, making it one of the first Hollywood films to hit theaters this year.

results_before_filter.title: Where are AI Investments Going in 2024?
results_before_filter.snippet: Several major companies are investing heavily in AI in 2024. Meta, led by Mark Zuckerberg, has invested $10 billion into computing infrastructure in pursuit of artificial general intelligence. Microsoft is investing over $2 billion into French startup Mistral to expand its AI capabilities. Amazon, Microsoft, OpenAI, and Nvidia are backing a startup that aims to develop human-like robots. OpenAI's CEO, Sam Altman, is raising up to $7 trillion for Chip Dream to address issues related to chip-building capacity. Elon Musk has secured $500 million for his AI start-up, xAI, which aims to integrate AI more into the X social media platform and other use cases. Intel joined forces with investment company Digital Bridge to create Articul8, a full-stack generative AI software platform. Former GitHub CEO Nat Friedman and entrepreneur Daniel Gross raised over $80M in a funding round for ElevenLabs, which aims to develop AI-powered audio tools. results_before_filter.title: Dopo ChatGPT i robot: ecco quello di OpenAI che mette a posto i piatti (video)
results_before_filter.snippet: OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, may soon go public with a valuation ranging from $80 to $100 billion. This is due to the AI boom sparked by ChatGPT. However, this might not be the end. Figure, a California-based startup, has collaborated with OpenAI to develop a robot called Figure 01. A video published on YouTube shows a human interacting with the robot, asking it to identify objects in a room. The robot identifies a red apple on a plate, a plate of snacks, and the human standing nearby with a hand on the table. The human asks if they can eat the apple, and the robot offers it. The human then introduces trash and asks the robot to explain why they gave them the apple and to pick up the trash. The robot picks up the trash while explaining the move with the apple: "I gave you the apple because it was the only edible item on the table." Finally, the human asks the robot what should happen next based on the plate placement. The robot suggests that the plate with the apple should be put in the snack plate. The human confirms the suggestion and asks the robot to do this, demonstrating impressive dexterity and precision in picking up the cup and flipping it before putting it back in its place. Another demonstration of precision follows when the robot places the plate in a designated compartment of the snack plate.

results_before_filter.title: Windows Copilot: GPT4-Turbo è disponibile gratis per gli utenti
results_before_filter.snippet: Microsoft has announced the availability of GPT4-Turbo for the free version of Windows Copilot, making it even more complete and efficient. The update is now available for free users of Copilot, who can now use GPT4-Turbo, the new language model at the base of the free version of Copilot, which is becoming more integrated into various Microsoft services. This announcement came from Mikhail Parakhin, head of the division responsible for Microsoft's web services. This is a new step forward in the development and diffusion of Copilot. Windows Copilot now uses GPT4-Turbo Users of the free version of Copilot now have the opportunity to use GPT4-Turbo, the new language model presented by OpenAI last fall and capable of generating longer texts (up to 300 pages per single prompt) with a greater understanding of requests and a knowledge base up to April 2023, to provide more up-to-date information. Note that Pro users will have the opportunity to continue using the previous model, activating the appropriate selector that allows you to switch from GPT4-Turbo to GPT4 based on their preferences. The transition to GPT4-Turbo for the free version of Copilot, in addition to improving performance for users, will allow for cost reduction. results_before_filter.title: MotoGP 24 annunciato per PC e console, le novità
results_before_filter.snippet: Milestone and MotoGP have announced MotoGP 24, the official MotoGP video game for the 2024 season, which will include MotoGP, Moto2, Moto3, and the FIM Enel MotoE Championship. The game will be released on May 2, 2024 on various platforms: PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and Steam. The game aims to reflect the real race experience with the introduction of new features such as dynamic weather, flag-to-flag races, a rider market, and the MotoGP Stewards to further approach the dynamics of the races. Significant changes such as Marc Márquez's move to the Gresini team with a Ducati will influence the game dynamics, with riders able to change teams, influencing each season with a different roster. The MotoGP Stewards will monitor the races and timed sessions, penalizing improper behavior on the track. This adds a level of realism to the rivalry between riders and career management. Milestone is committed to offering an optimal gaming experience with the introduction of an adaptive difficulty system, improvements to AI and physics, and a focus on tire management. The online section of the game includes LiveGP Championships, a competitive multiplayer mode with rankings, and support for cross-play and local split-screen. results_before_filter.title: Microsoft выпустит продукт Security AI
results_before_filter.snippet: Microsoft plans to release AI tools for cybersecurity professionals to analyze suspicious incidents and identify methods that hackers use to hide their intentions. Microsoft introduced its Security Copilot a year ago and has been testing it with corporate clients, including BP Plc and Dow Chemical Co. The company now counts 'hundreds of partners and customers', according to Andrew Conway, Microsoft's vice president of security marketing. Clients will pay a commission based on usage, just like with Azure cloud services. Security Copilot is part of Microsoft's ongoing efforts to fill its mainstream product lines with AI tools from partner OpenAI and persuade corporate clients to buy subscriptions. While AI can help generate content and synthesize corporate data, it also makes mistakes. Since computer security is so important and the risks are so high, Conway said that the software giant has taken special care with this assistant. The software combines the power of OpenAI's model with vast amounts of security information that Microsoft collects. "Given the seriousness of the use, we are taking a series of measures to eliminate risks," he said, including constantly gathering feedback on the product and identifying areas where it does not meet requirements. results_before_filter.title: Osaic Welcomes Cohen Financial Services from Cetera Advisors
results_before_filter.snippet: Osaic, a leading provider of wealth management services, announced the successful recruitment of Cohen Financial Services, adding $165 million in client assets to Osaic's New Century Financial Group, bringing the total client assets to over $1 billion. Cohen Financial Services, founded in 1960, is based in Overland Park, Kansas, and provides a range of services including multi-generational financial planning, investment and risk management, retirement and estate planning, employee benefits, business succession strategies, and insurance services. The team, led by Jason Stewart, includes partners, financial advisors, and support staff. The addition of Cohen Financial Services brings the total number of financial advisors in New Century to 30.

results_before_filter.title: OpenAI Could Let Users Send Two Times Longer Prompts In GPT-4's Next Big Update, Leak Suggests
results_before_filter.snippet: OpenAI may have accidentally leaked information about an upcoming version of its AI chatbot, GPT 4.5 Turbo, with twice as many tokens as the current version, GPT-4 Turbo, announced in November. Users on Reddit reported that they were able to scoop up some details about ChatGPT 4.5 Turbo, which could be the next major update from Microsoft Corp.-backed MSFT OpenAI. These details were revealed by Microsoft's Bing, and DuckDuckGo search engines, which cached a copy of the GPT 4.5 Turbo announcement page on OpenAI's website. Users claim that the information revealed by these two search engines suggests that OpenAI has two major updates in store for the next version of GPT. The new model can generate natural language or code with a context window of 256k tokens and has a knowledge cutoff date of June 2024. The leaked GPT-4.5 Turbo details reveal that the limit has been doubled to 256,000 tokens from ChatGPT 3.5's limit of 8,000, while GPT-4 Turbo's "Enterprise" version has a limit of 128,000 tokens. However, the knowledge cutoff date is June 2024, which is still over two months away, meaning GPT-4.5 Turbo might not be released until at least June. The increased competition

results_after_filter.title: El regreso triunfal: "Kung Fu Panda 4" arrasa en la taquilla en tiempo récord
results_after_filter.snippet: Kung Fu Panda 4, one of the most anticipated animated films of 2024, has received a 75% approval rating from critics on the film review portal Rotten Tomatoes after 48 reviews. The film has grossed over $100 million worldwide, $70 million in the US and Canada, and $30 million in the rest of the world, surpassing its production costs and becoming the highest-grossing film in the Kung Fu Panda franchise at its opening. The film follows Po, the Dragon Warrior, who is called by destiny to become the spiritual leader of the Peace Valley. However, Po's lack of leadership skills and his need to find and train a new Dragon Warrior quickly presents a challenge. Kung Fu Panda 4 will be released in Colombian cinemas on March 14, 2024, making it one of the first Hollywood films to hit theaters this year.

results_after_filter.title: Where are AI Investments Going in 2024?
results_after_filter.snippet: Several major companies are investing heavily in AI in 2024. Meta, led by Mark Zuckerberg, has invested $10 billion into computing infrastructure in pursuit of artificial general intelligence. Microsoft is investing over $2 billion into French startup Mistral to expand its AI capabilities. Amazon, Microsoft, OpenAI, and Nvidia are backing a startup that aims to develop human-like robots. OpenAI's CEO, Sam Altman, is raising up to $7 trillion for Chip Dream to address issues related to chip-building capacity. Elon Musk has secured $500 million for his AI start-up, xAI, which aims to integrate AI more into the X social media platform and other use cases. Intel joined forces with investment company Digital Bridge to create Articul8, a full-stack generative AI software platform. Former GitHub CEO Nat Friedman and entrepreneur Daniel Gross raised over $80M in a funding round for ElevenLabs, which aims to develop AI-powered audio tools. If you're interested in AI funding and investments, consider attending the ODSC East 2024 conference in April.

results_after_filter.title: Dopo ChatGPT i robot: ecco quello di OpenAI che mette a posto i piatti (video)
results_after_filter.snippet: OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, may soon go public with a valuation ranging from $80 to $100 billion. This is due to the AI boom sparked by ChatGPT. However, this might not be the end. Figure, a California-based startup, has collaborated with OpenAI to develop a robot called Figure 01. A video published on YouTube shows a human interacting with the robot, asking it to identify objects in a room. The robot identifies a red apple on a plate, a plate of snacks, and the human standing nearby with a hand on the table. The human asks if they can eat the apple, and the robot offers it. The human then introduces trash and asks the robot to explain why they gave them the apple and to pick up the trash. The robot picks up the trash while explaining the move with the apple: "I gave you the apple because it was the only edible item on the table." Finally, the human asks the robot what should happen next based on the plate placement. The robot suggests that the plate with the apple should be put in the snack plate. The human confirms the suggestion and asks the robot to do this, demonstrating impressive dexterity and precision in picking up the cup and flipping it before putting it back in its place. Another demonstration of precision follows when the robot places the plate in a designated compartment of the snack plate.

results_after_filter.title: Windows Copilot: GPT4-Turbo è disponibile gratis per gli utenti
results_after_filter.snippet: Microsoft has announced the availability of GPT4-Turbo for the free version of Windows Copilot, making it even more complete and efficient. The update is now available for free users of Copilot, who can now use GPT4-Turbo, the new language model at the base of the free version of Copilot, which is becoming more integrated into various Microsoft services. This announcement came from Mikhail Parakhin, head of the division responsible for Microsoft's web services. This is a new step forward in the development and diffusion of Copilot. Windows Copilot now uses GPT4-Turbo Users of the free version of Copilot now have the opportunity to use GPT4-Turbo, the new language model presented by OpenAI last fall and capable of generating longer texts (up to 300 pages per single prompt) with a greater understanding of requests and a knowledge base up to April 2023, to provide more up-to-date information. Note that Pro users will have the opportunity to continue using the previous model, activating the appropriate selector that allows you to switch from GPT4-Turbo to GPT4 based on their preferences. The transition to GPT4-Turbo for the free version of Copilot, in addition to improving performance for users, will allow for cost reduction. During the presentation of the new model, OpenAI had confirmed that Turbo was, on average, up to three times more economical for input tokens and up to twice

results_after_filter.title: MotoGP 24 annunciato per PC e console, le novità
results_after_filter.snippet: Milestone and MotoGP have announced MotoGP 24, the official MotoGP video game for the 2024 season, which will include MotoGP, Moto2, Moto3, and the FIM Enel MotoE Championship. The game will be released on May 2, 2024 on various platforms: PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and Steam. The game aims to reflect the real race experience with the introduction of new features such as dynamic weather, flag-to-flag races, a rider market, and the MotoGP Stewards to further approach the dynamics of the races. Significant changes such as Marc Márquez's move to the Gresini team with a Ducati will influence the game dynamics, with riders able to change teams, influencing each season with a different roster. The MotoGP Stewards will monitor the races and timed sessions, penalizing improper behavior on the track. This adds a level of realism to the rivalry between riders and career management. Milestone is committed to offering an optimal gaming experience with the introduction of an adaptive difficulty system, improvements to AI and physics, and a focus on tire management. The online section of the game includes LiveGP Championships, a competitive multiplayer mode with rankings, and support for cross-play and local split-screen. Custom helmet, sticker, race number, and helmet top edit

The game aims to reflect the real race experience with the introduction of new features such as dynamic weather, flag-to-flag races, a rider market, and the MotoGP Stewards to further approach the dynamics of the races. Significant changes such as Marc Márquez's move to the Gresini team with a Ducati will influence the game dynamics, with riders able to change teams, influencing each season with a different roster. The MotoGP Stewards will monitor the races and timed sessions, penalizing improper behavior on the track. This adds a level of realism to the rivalry between riders and career management. Milestone is committed to offering an optimal gaming experience with the introduction of an adaptive difficulty system, improvements to AI and physics, and a focus on tire management. The online section of the game includes LiveGP Championships, a competitive multiplayer mode with rankings, and support for cross-play and local split-screen. Custom helmet, sticker, race number, and helmet top edit

results_after_filter.title: Microsoft выпустит продукт Security AI
results_after_filter.snippet: Microsoft plans to release AI tools for cybersecurity professionals to analyze suspicious incidents and identify methods that hackers use to hide their intentions. Microsoft introduced its Security Copilot a year ago and has been testing it with corporate clients, including BP Plc and Dow Chemical Co. The company now counts 'hundreds of partners and customers', according to Andrew Conway, Microsoft's vice president of security marketing. Clients will pay a commission based on usage, just like with Azure cloud services. Security Copilot is part of Microsoft's ongoing efforts to fill its mainstream product lines with AI tools from partner OpenAI and persuade corporate clients to buy subscriptions. While AI can help generate content and synthesize corporate data, it also makes mistakes. Since computer security is so important and the risks are so high, Conway said that the software giant has taken special care with this assistant. The software combines the power of OpenAI's model with vast amounts of security information that Microsoft collects. "Given the seriousness of the use, we are taking a series of measures to eliminate risks," he said, including constantly gathering feedback on the product and identifying areas where it does not meet requirements. "Given the above, security is still a place where security products generate false-positive and false-negative results. This is the nature of the space." Copilot works with all of Microsoft's security software to provide an assistant panel that can compile data and answer questions. For example, one

results_after_filter.title: Osaic Welcomes Cohen Financial Services from Cetera Advisors
results_after_filter.snippet: Osaic, a leading provider of wealth management services, announced the successful recruitment of Cohen Financial Services, adding $165 million in client assets to Osaic's New Century Financial Group, bringing the total client assets to over $1 billion. Cohen Financial Services, founded in 1960, is based in Overland Park, Kansas, and provides a range of services including multi-generational financial planning, investment and risk management, retirement and estate planning, employee benefits, business succession strategies, and insurance services. The team, led by Jason Stewart, includes partners, financial advisors, and support staff. The addition of Cohen Financial Services brings the total number of financial advisors in New Century to 30.

results_after_filter.title: OpenAI Could Let Users Send Two Times Longer Prompts In GPT-4's Next Big Update, Leak Suggests
results_after_filter.snippet: OpenAI may have accidentally leaked information about an upcoming version of its AI chatbot, GPT 4.5 Turbo, with twice as many tokens as the current version, GPT-4 Turbo, announced in November. Users on Reddit reported that they were able to scoop up some details about ChatGPT 4.5 Turbo, which could be the next major update from Microsoft Corp.-backed MSFT OpenAI. These details were revealed by Microsoft's Bing, and DuckDuckGo search engines, which cached a copy of the GPT 4.5 Turbo announcement page on OpenAI's website. Users claim that the information revealed by these two search engines suggests that OpenAI has two major updates in store for the next version of GPT. The new model can generate natural language or code with a context window of 256k tokens and has a knowledge cutoff date of June 2024. The leaked GPT-4.5 Turbo details reveal that the limit has been doubled to 256,000 tokens from ChatGPT 3.5's limit of 8,000, while GPT-4 Turbo's "Enterprise" version has a limit of 128,000 tokens. However, the knowledge cutoff date is June 2024, which is still over two months away, meaning GPT-4.5 Turbo might not be released until at least June. The increased competition

results_before_filter.title: El regreso triunfal: "Kung Fu Panda 4" arrasa en la taquilla en tiempo récord
results_before_filter.snippet: Kung Fu Panda 4, one of the most anticipated animated films of 2024, has received a 75% approval rating from critics on the film review portal Rotten Tomatoes after 48 reviews. The film has grossed over $100 million worldwide, $70 million in the US and Canada, and $30 million in the rest of the world, surpassing its production costs and becoming the highest-grossing film in the Kung Fu Panda franchise at its opening. The film follows Po, the Dragon Warrior, who is called by destiny to become the spiritual leader of the Peace Valley. However, Po's lack of leadership skills and his need to find and train a new Dragon Warrior quickly presents a challenge. Kung Fu Panda 4 will be released in Colombian cinemas on March 14, 2024, making it one of the first Hollywood films to hit theaters this year.

results_before_filter.title: Where are AI Investments Going in 2024?
results_before_filter.snippet: Several major companies are investing heavily in AI in 2024. Meta, led by Mark Zuckerberg, has invested $10 billion into computing infrastructure in pursuit of artificial general intelligence. Microsoft is investing over $2 billion into French startup Mistral to expand its AI capabilities. Amazon, Microsoft, OpenAI, and Nvidia are backing a startup that aims to develop human-like robots. OpenAI's CEO, Sam Altman, is raising up to $7 trillion for Chip Dream to address issues related to chip-building capacity. Elon Musk has secured $500 million for his AI start-up, xAI, which aims to integrate AI more into the X social media platform and other use cases. Intel joined forces with investment company Digital Bridge to create Articul8, a full-stack generative AI software platform. Former GitHub CEO Nat Friedman and entrepreneur Daniel Gross raised over $80M in a funding round for ElevenLabs, which aims to develop AI-powered audio tools. If you're interested in AI funding and investments, consider attending the ODSC East 2024 conference in April.

results_before_filter.title: Dopo ChatGPT i robot: ecco quello di OpenAI che mette a posto i piatti (video)
results_before_filter.snippet: OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, may soon go public with a valuation ranging from $80 to $100 billion. This is due to the AI boom sparked by ChatGPT. However, this might not be the end. Figure, a California-based startup, has collaborated with OpenAI to develop a robot called Figure 01. A video published on YouTube shows a human interacting with the robot, asking it to identify objects in a room. The robot identifies a red apple on a plate, a plate of snacks, and the human standing nearby with a hand on the table. The human asks if they can eat the apple, and the robot offers it. The human then introduces trash and asks the robot to explain why they gave them the apple and to pick up the trash. The robot picks up the trash while explaining the move with the apple: "I gave you the apple because it was the only edible item on the table." Finally, the human asks the robot what should happen next based on the plate placement. The robot suggests that the plate with the apple should be put in the snack plate. The human confirms the suggestion and asks the robot to do this, demonstrating impressive dexterity and precision in picking up the cup and flipping it before putting it back in its place. Another demonstration of precision follows when the robot places the plate in a designated compartment of the snack plate.

results_before_filter.title: Windows Copilot: GPT4-Turbo è disponibile gratis per gli utenti
results_before_filter.snippet: Microsoft has announced the availability of GPT4-Turbo for the free version of Windows Copilot, making it even more complete and efficient. The update is now available for free users of Copilot, who can now use GPT4-Turbo, the new language model at the base of the free version of Copilot, which is becoming more integrated into various Microsoft services. This announcement came from Mikhail Parakhin, head of the division responsible for Microsoft's web services. This is a new step forward in the development and diffusion of Copilot. Windows Copilot now uses GPT4-Turbo Users of the free version of Copilot now have the opportunity to use GPT4-Turbo, the new language model presented by OpenAI last fall and capable of generating longer texts (up to 300 pages per single prompt) with a greater understanding of requests and a knowledge base up to April 2023, to provide more up-to-date information. Note that Pro users will have the opportunity to continue using the previous model, activating the appropriate selector that allows you to switch from GPT4-Turbo to GPT4 based on their preferences. The transition to GPT4-Turbo for the free version of Copilot, in addition to improving performance for users, will allow for cost reduction. During the presentation of the new model, OpenAI had confirmed that Turbo was, on average, up to three times more economical for input tokens and up to twice

results_before_filter.title: MotoGP 24 annunciato per PC e console, le novità
results_before_filter.snippet: Milestone and MotoGP have announced MotoGP 24, the official MotoGP video game for the 2024 season, which will include MotoGP, Moto2, Moto3, and the FIM Enel MotoE Championship. The game will be released on May 2, 2024 on various platforms: PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and Steam. The game aims to reflect the real race experience with the introduction of new features such as dynamic weather, flag-to-flag races, a rider market, and the MotoGP Stewards to further approach the dynamics of the races. Significant changes such as Marc Márquez's move to the Gresini team with a Ducati will influence the game dynamics, with riders able to change teams, influencing each season with a different roster. The MotoGP Stewards will monitor the races and timed sessions, penalizing improper behavior on the track. This adds a level of realism to the rivalry between riders and career management. Milestone is committed to offering an optimal gaming experience with the introduction of an adaptive difficulty system, improvements to AI and physics, and a focus on tire management. The online section of the game includes LiveGP Championships, a competitive multiplayer mode with rankings, and support for cross-play and local split-screen. Custom helmet, sticker, race number, and helmet top edit

results_before_filter.title: Microsoft выпустит продукт Security AI
results_before_filter.snippet: Microsoft plans to release AI tools for cybersecurity professionals to analyze suspicious incidents and identify methods that hackers use to hide their intentions. Microsoft introduced its Security Copilot a year ago and has been testing it with corporate clients, including BP Plc and Dow Chemical Co. The company now counts 'hundreds of partners and customers', according to Andrew Conway, Microsoft's vice president of security marketing. Clients will pay a commission based on usage, just like with Azure cloud services. Security Copilot is part of Microsoft's ongoing efforts to fill its mainstream product lines with AI tools from partner OpenAI and persuade corporate clients to buy subscriptions. While AI can help generate content and synthesize corporate data, it also makes mistakes. Since computer security is so important and the risks are so high, Conway said that the software giant has taken special care with this assistant. The software combines the power of OpenAI's model with vast amounts of security information that Microsoft collects. "Given the seriousness of the use, we are taking a series of measures to eliminate risks," he said, including constantly gathering feedback on the product and identifying areas where it does not meet requirements. "Given the above, security is still a place where security products generate false-positive and false-negative results. This is the nature of the space." results_before_filter.title: Osaic Welcomes Cohen Financial Services from Cetera Advisors
results_before_filter.snippet: Osaic, a leading provider of wealth management services, announced the successful recruitment of Cohen Financial Services, adding $165 million in client assets to Osaic's New Century Financial Group, bringing the total client assets to over $1 billion. Cohen Financial Services, founded in 1960, is based in Overland Park, Kansas, and provides a range of services including multi-generational financial planning, investment and risk management, retirement and estate planning, employee benefits, business succession strategies, and insurance services. The team, led by Jason Stewart, includes partners, financial advisors, and support staff. The addition of Cohen Financial Services brings the total number of financial advisors in New Century to 30.

results_before_filter.title: OpenAI Could Let Users Send Two Times Longer Prompts In GPT-4's Next Big Update, Leak Suggests
results_before_filter.snippet: OpenAI may have accidentally leaked information about an upcoming version of its AI chatbot, GPT 4.5 Turbo, with twice as many tokens as the current version, GPT-4 Turbo, announced in November. Users on Reddit reported that they were able to scoop up some details about ChatGPT 4.5 Turbo, which could be the next major update from Microsoft Corp.-backed MSFT OpenAI. These details were revealed by Microsoft's Bing, and DuckDuckGo search engines, which cached a copy of the GPT 4.5 Turbo announcement page on OpenAI's website. Users claim that the information revealed by these two search engines suggests that OpenAI has two major updates in store for the next version of GPT. The new model can generate natural language or code with a context window of 256k tokens and has a knowledge cutoff date of June 2024. The leaked GPT-4.5 Turbo details reveal that the limit has been doubled to 256,000 tokens from ChatGPT 3.5's limit of 8,000, while GPT-4 Turbo's "Enterprise" version has a limit of 128,000 tokens. However, the knowledge cutoff date is June 2024, which is still over two months away, meaning GPT-4.5 Turbo might not be released until at least June. The increased competition

results_after_filter.title: El regreso triunfal: "Kung Fu Panda 4" arrasa en la taquilla en tiempo récord
results_after_filter.snippet: Kung Fu Panda 4, one of the most anticipated animated films of 2024, has received a 75% approval rating from critics on the film review portal Rotten Tomatoes after 48 reviews. The film has grossed over $100 million worldwide, $70 million in the US and Canada, and $30 million in the rest of the world, surpassing its production costs and becoming the highest-grossing film in the Kung Fu Panda franchise at its opening. The film follows Po, the Dragon Warrior, who is called by destiny to become the spiritual leader of the Peace Valley. However, Po's lack of leadership skills and his need to find and train a new Dragon Warrior quickly presents a challenge. Kung Fu Panda 4 will be released in Colombian cinemas on March 14, 2024, making it one of the first Hollywood films to hit theaters this year.

results_after_filter.title: Where are AI Investments Going in 2024?
results_after_filter.snippet: Several major companies are investing heavily in AI in 2024. Meta, led by Mark Zuckerberg, has invested $10 billion into computing infrastructure in pursuit of artificial general intelligence. Microsoft is investing over $2 billion into French startup Mistral to expand its AI capabilities. Amazon, Microsoft, OpenAI, and Nvidia are backing a startup that aims to develop human-like robots. OpenAI's CEO, Sam Altman, is raising up to $7 trillion for Chip Dream to address issues related to chip-building capacity. Elon Musk has secured $500 million for his AI start-up, xAI, which aims to integrate AI more into the X social media platform and other use cases. Intel joined forces with investment company Digital Bridge to create Articul8, a full-stack generative AI software platform. Former GitHub CEO Nat Friedman and entrepreneur Daniel Gross raised over $80M in a funding round for ElevenLabs, which aims to develop AI-powered audio tools. If you're interested in AI funding and investments, consider attending the ODSC East 2024 conference in April.

results_after_filter.title: Dopo ChatGPT i robot: ecco quello di OpenAI che mette a posto i piatti (video)
results_after_filter.snippet: OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, may soon go public with a valuation ranging from $80 to $100 billion. This is due to the AI boom sparked by ChatGPT. However, this might not be the end. Figure, a California-based startup, has collaborated with OpenAI to develop a robot called Figure 01. A video published on YouTube shows a human interacting with the robot, asking it to identify objects in a room. The robot identifies a red apple on a plate, a plate of snacks, and the human standing nearby with a hand on the table. The human asks if they can eat the apple, and the robot offers it. The human then introduces trash and asks the robot to explain why they gave them the apple and to pick up the trash. The robot picks up the trash while explaining the move with the apple: "I gave you the apple because it was the only edible item on the table." Finally, the human asks the robot what should happen next based on the plate placement. The robot suggests that the plate with the apple should be put in the snack plate. The human confirms the suggestion and asks the robot to do this, demonstrating impressive dexterity and precision in picking up the cup and flipping it before putting it back in its place. Another demonstration of precision follows when the robot places the plate in a designated compartment of the snack plate.

results_after_filter.title: Windows Copilot: GPT4-Turbo è disponibile gratis per gli utenti
results_after_filter.snippet: Microsoft has announced the availability of GPT4-Turbo for the free version of Windows Copilot, making it even more complete and efficient. The update is now available for free users of Copilot, who can now use GPT4-Turbo, the new language model at the base of the free version of Copilot, which is becoming more integrated into various Microsoft services. This announcement came from Mikhail Parakhin, head of the division responsible for Microsoft's web services. This is a new step forward in the development and diffusion of Copilot. Windows Copilot now uses GPT4-Turbo Users of the free version of Copilot now have the opportunity to use GPT4-Turbo, the new language model presented by OpenAI last fall and capable of generating longer texts (up to 300 pages per single prompt) with a greater understanding of requests and a knowledge base up to April 2023, to provide more up-to-date information. Note that Pro users will have the opportunity to continue using the previous model, activating the appropriate selector that allows you to switch from GPT4-Turbo to GPT4 based on their preferences. The transition to GPT4-Turbo for the free version of Copilot, in addition to improving performance for users, will allow for cost reduction. During the presentation of the new model, OpenAI had confirmed that Turbo was, on average, up to three times more economical for input tokens and up to twice

The update is now available for free users of Copilot, who can now use GPT4-Turbo, the new language model at the base of the free version of Copilot, which is becoming more integrated into various Microsoft services. This announcement came from Mikhail Parakhin, head of the division responsible for Microsoft's web services. This is a new step forward in the development and diffusion of Copilot. Windows Copilot now uses GPT4-Turbo Users of the free version of Copilot now have the opportunity to use GPT4-Turbo, the new language model presented by OpenAI last fall and capable of generating longer texts (up to 300 pages per single prompt) with a greater understanding of requests and a knowledge base up to April 2023, to provide more up-to-date information. Note that Pro users will have the opportunity to continue using the previous model, activating the appropriate selector that allows you to switch from GPT4-Turbo to GPT4 based on their preferences. The transition to GPT4-Turbo for the free version of Copilot, in addition to improving performance for users, will allow for cost reduction. During the presentation of the new model, OpenAI had confirmed that Turbo was, on average, up to three times more economical for input tokens and up to twice

results_after_filter.title: MotoGP 24 annunciato per PC e console, le novità
results_after_filter.snippet: Milestone and MotoGP have announced MotoGP 24, the official MotoGP video game for the 2024 season, which will include MotoGP, Moto2, Moto3, and the FIM Enel MotoE Championship. The game will be released on May 2, 2024 on various platforms: PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and Steam. The game aims to reflect the real race experience with the introduction of new features such as dynamic weather, flag-to-flag races, a rider market, and the MotoGP Stewards to further approach the dynamics of the races. Significant changes such as Marc Márquez's move to the Gresini team with a Ducati will influence the game dynamics, with riders able to change teams, influencing each season with a different roster. The MotoGP Stewards will monitor the races and timed sessions, penalizing improper behavior on the track. This adds a level of realism to the rivalry between riders and career management. Milestone is committed to offering an optimal gaming experience with the introduction of an adaptive difficulty system, improvements to AI and physics, and a focus on tire management. The online section of the game includes LiveGP Championships, a competitive multiplayer mode with rankings, and support for cross-play and local split-screen. Custom helmet, sticker, race number, and helmet top edit

results_after_filter.title: Microsoft выпустит продукт Security AI
results_after_filter.snippet: Microsoft plans to release AI tools for cybersecurity professionals to analyze suspicious incidents and identify methods that hackers use to hide their intentions. Microsoft introduced its Security Copilot a year ago and has been testing it with corporate clients, including BP Plc and Dow Chemical Co. The company now counts 'hundreds of partners and customers', according to Andrew Conway, Microsoft's vice president of security marketing. Clients will pay a commission based on usage, just like with Azure cloud services. Security Copilot is part of Microsoft's ongoing efforts to fill its mainstream product lines with AI tools from partner OpenAI and persuade corporate clients to buy subscriptions. While AI can help generate content and synthesize corporate data, it also makes mistakes. Since computer security is so important and the risks are so high, Conway said that the software giant has taken special care with this assistant. The software combines the power of OpenAI's model with vast amounts of security information that Microsoft collects. "Given the seriousness of the use, we are taking a series of measures to eliminate risks," he said, including constantly gathering feedback on the product and identifying areas where it does not meet requirements. "Given the above, security is still a place where security products generate false-positive and false-negative results. This is the nature of the space." Copilot works with all of Microsoft's security software to provide an assistant panel that can compile data and answer questions. For example, one

results_after_filter.title: Osaic Welcomes Cohen Financial Services from Cetera Advisors
results_after_filter.snippet: Osaic, a leading provider of wealth management services, announced the successful recruitment of Cohen Financial Services, adding $165 million in client assets to Osaic's New Century Financial Group, bringing the total client assets to over $1 billion. Cohen Financial Services, founded in 1960, is based in Overland Park, Kansas, and provides a range of services including multi-generational financial planning, investment and risk management, retirement and estate planning, employee benefits, business succession strategies, and insurance services. The team, led by Jason Stewart, includes partners, financial advisors, and support staff. The addition of Cohen Financial Services brings the total number of financial advisors in New Century to 30.

results_after_filter.title: OpenAI Could Let Users Send Two Times Longer Prompts In GPT-4's Next Big Update, Leak Suggests
results_after_filter.snippet: OpenAI may have accidentally leaked information about an upcoming version of its AI chatbot, GPT 4.5 Turbo, with twice as many tokens as the current version, GPT-4 Turbo, announced in November. Users on Reddit reported that they were able to scoop up some details about ChatGPT 4.5 Turbo, which could be the next major update from Microsoft Corp.-backed MSFT OpenAI. These details were revealed by Microsoft's Bing, and DuckDuckGo search engines, which cached a copy of the GPT 4.5 Turbo announcement page on OpenAI's website. Users claim that the information revealed by these two search engines suggests that OpenAI has two major updates in store for the next version of GPT. The new model can generate natural language or code with a context window of 256k tokens and has a knowledge cutoff date of June 2024. The leaked GPT-4.5 Turbo details reveal that the limit has been doubled to 256,000 tokens from ChatGPT 3.5's limit of 8,000, while GPT-4 Turbo's "Enterprise" version has a limit of 128,000 tokens. However, the knowledge cutoff date is June 2024, which is still over two months away, meaning GPT-4.5 Turbo might not be released until at least June. The increased competition

results_before_filter.title: El regreso triunfal: "Kung Fu Panda 4" arrasa en la taquilla en tiempo récord
results_before_filter.snippet: Kung Fu Panda 4, one of the most anticipated animated films of 2024, has received a 75% approval rating from critics on the film review portal Rotten Tomatoes after 48 reviews. The film has grossed over $100 million worldwide, $70 million in the US and Canada, and $30 million in the rest of the world, surpassing its production costs and becoming the highest-grossing film in the Kung Fu Panda franchise at its opening. The film follows Po, the Dragon Warrior, who is called by destiny to become the spiritual leader of the Peace Valley. However, Po's lack of leadership skills and his need to find and train a new Dragon Warrior quickly presents a challenge. Kung Fu Panda 4 will be released in Colombian cinemas on March 14, 2024, making it one of the first Hollywood films to hit theaters this year.

results_before_filter.title: Where are AI Investments Going in 2024?
results_before_filter.snippet: Several major companies are investing heavily in AI in 2024. Meta, led by Mark Zuckerberg, has invested $10 billion into computing infrastructure in pursuit of artificial general intelligence. Microsoft is investing over $2 billion into French startup Mistral to expand its AI capabilities. Amazon, Microsoft, OpenAI, and Nvidia are backing a startup that aims to develop human-like robots. OpenAI's CEO, Sam Altman, is raising up to $7 trillion for Chip Dream to address issues related to chip-building capacity. Elon Musk has secured $500 million for his AI start-up, xAI, which aims to integrate AI more into the X social media platform and other use cases. Intel joined forces with investment company Digital Bridge to create Articul8, a full-stack generative AI software platform. Former GitHub CEO Nat Friedman and entrepreneur Daniel Gross raised over $80M in a funding round for ElevenLabs, which aims to develop AI-powered audio tools. If you're interested in AI funding and investments, consider attending the ODSC East 2024 conference in April.

results_before_filter.title: Dopo ChatGPT i robot: ecco quello di OpenAI che mette a posto i piatti (video)
results_before_filter.snippet: OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, may soon go public with a valuation ranging from $80 to $100 billion. This is due to the AI boom sparked by ChatGPT. However, this might not be the end. Figure, a California-based startup, has collaborated with OpenAI to develop a robot called Figure 01. A video published on YouTube shows a human interacting with the robot, asking it to identify objects in a room. The robot identifies a red apple on a plate, a plate of snacks, and the human standing nearby with a hand on the table. The human asks if they can eat the apple, and the robot offers it. The human then introduces trash and asks the robot to explain why they gave them the apple and to pick up the trash. The robot picks up the trash while explaining the move with the apple: "I gave you the apple because it was the only edible item on the table." Finally, the human asks the robot what should happen next based on the plate placement. The robot suggests that the plate with the apple should be put in the snack plate. The human confirms the suggestion and asks the robot to do this, demonstrating impressive dexterity and precision in picking up the cup and flipping it before putting it back in its place. Another demonstration of precision follows when the robot places the plate in a designated compartment of the snack plate.

The robot identifies a red apple on a plate, a plate of snacks, and the human standing nearby with a hand on the table. The human asks if they can eat the apple, and the robot offers it. The human then introduces trash and asks the robot to explain why they gave them the apple and to pick up the trash. The robot picks up the trash while explaining the move with the apple: "I gave you the apple because it was the only edible item on the table." Finally, the human asks the robot what should happen next based on the plate placement. The robot suggests that the plate with the apple should be put in the snack plate. The human confirms the suggestion and asks the robot to do this, demonstrating impressive dexterity and precision in picking up the cup and flipping it before putting it back in its place. Another demonstration of precision follows when the robot places the plate in a designated compartment of the snack plate.

results_before_filter.title: MotoGP 24 annunciato per PC e console, le novità
results_before_filter.snippet: Milestone and MotoGP have announced MotoGP 24, the official MotoGP video game for the 2024 season, which will include MotoGP, Moto2, Moto3, and the FIM Enel MotoE Championship. The game will be released on May 2, 2024 on various platforms: PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and Steam. The game aims to reflect the real race experience with the introduction of new features such as dynamic weather, flag-to-flag races, a rider market, and the MotoGP Stewards to further approach the dynamics of the races. Significant changes such as Marc Márquez's move to the Gresini team with a Ducati will influence the game dynamics, with riders able to change teams, influencing each season with a different roster. The MotoGP Stewards will monitor the races and timed sessions, penalizing improper behavior on the track. This adds a level of realism to the rivalry between riders and career management. Milestone is committed to offering an optimal gaming experience with the introduction of an adaptive difficulty system, improvements to AI and physics, and a focus on tire management. The online section of the game includes LiveGP Championships, a competitive multiplayer mode with rankings, and support for cross-play and local split-screen. Custom helmet, sticker, race number, and helmet top edit

results_before_filter.title: Microsoft выпустит продукт Security AI
results_before_filter.snippet: Microsoft plans to release AI tools for cybersecurity professionals to analyze suspicious incidents and identify methods that hackers use to hide their intentions. Microsoft introduced its Security Copilot a year ago and has been testing it with corporate clients, including BP Plc and Dow Chemical Co. The company now counts 'hundreds of partners and customers', according to Andrew Conway, Microsoft's vice president of security marketing. Clients will pay a commission based on usage, just like with Azure cloud services. Security Copilot is part of Microsoft's ongoing efforts to fill its mainstream product lines with AI tools from partner OpenAI and persuade corporate clients to buy subscriptions. While AI can help generate content and synthesize corporate data, it also makes mistakes. Since computer security is so important and the risks are so high, Conway said that the software giant has taken special care with this assistant. The software combines the power of OpenAI's model with vast amounts of security information that Microsoft collects. "Given the seriousness of the use, we are taking a series of measures to eliminate risks," he said, including constantly gathering feedback on the product and identifying areas where it does not meet requirements. "Given the above, security is still a place where security products generate false-positive and false-negative results. This is the nature of the space." Copilot works with all of Microsoft's security software to provide an assistant panel that can compile data and answer questions. For example, one

results_before_filter.title: Osaic Welcomes Cohen Financial Services from Cetera Advisors
results_before_filter.snippet: Osaic, a leading provider of wealth management services, announced the successful recruitment of Cohen Financial Services, adding $165 million in client assets to Osaic's New Century Financial Group, bringing the total client assets to over $1 billion. Cohen Financial Services, founded in 1960, is based in Overland Park, Kansas, and provides a range of services including multi-generational financial planning, investment and risk management, retirement and estate planning, employee benefits, business succession strategies, and insurance services. The team, led by Jason Stewart, includes partners, financial advisors, and support staff. The addition of Cohen Financial Services brings the total number of financial advisors in New Century to 30.

results_before_filter.title: OpenAI Could Let Users Send Two Times Longer Prompts In GPT-4's Next Big Update, Leak Suggests
results_before_filter.snippet: OpenAI may have accidentally leaked information about an upcoming version of its AI chatbot, GPT 4.5 Turbo, with twice as many tokens as the current version, GPT-4 Turbo, announced in November. Users on Reddit reported that they were able to scoop up some details about ChatGPT 4.5 Turbo, which could be the next major update from Microsoft Corp.-backed MSFT OpenAI. These details were revealed by Microsoft's Bing, and DuckDuckGo search engines, which cached a copy of the GPT 4.5 Turbo announcement page on OpenAI's website. Users claim that the information revealed by these two search engines suggests that OpenAI has two major updates in store for the next version of GPT. The new model can generate natural language or code with a context window of 256k tokens and has a knowledge cutoff date of June 2024. The leaked GPT-4.5 Turbo details reveal that the limit has been doubled to 256,000 tokens from ChatGPT 3.5's limit of 8,000, while GPT-4 Turbo's "Enterprise" version has a limit of 128,000 tokens. However, the knowledge cutoff date is June 2024, which is still over two months away, meaning GPT-4.5 Turbo might not be released until at least June. The increased competition

results_after_filter.title: El regreso triunfal: "Kung Fu Panda 4" arrasa en la taquilla en tiempo récord
results_after_filter.snippet: Kung Fu Panda 4, one of the most anticipated animated films of 2024, has received a 75% approval rating from critics on the film review portal Rotten Tomatoes after 48 reviews. The film has grossed over $100 million worldwide, $70 million in the US and Canada, and $30 million in the rest of the world, surpassing its production costs and becoming the highest-grossing film in the Kung Fu Panda franchise at its opening. The film follows Po, the Dragon Warrior, who is called by destiny to become the spiritual leader of the Peace Valley. However, Po's lack of leadership skills and his need to find and train a new Dragon Warrior quickly presents a challenge. Kung Fu Panda 4 will be released in Colombian cinemas on March 14, 2024, making it one of the first Hollywood films to hit theaters this year.

results_after_filter.title: Where are AI Investments Going in 2024?
results_after_filter.snippet: Several major companies are investing heavily in AI in 2024. Meta, led by Mark Zuckerberg, has invested $10 billion into computing infrastructure in pursuit of artificial general intelligence. Microsoft is investing over $2 billion into French startup Mistral to expand its AI capabilities. Amazon, Microsoft, OpenAI, and Nvidia are backing a startup that aims to develop human-like robots. OpenAI's CEO, Sam Altman, is raising up to $7 trillion for Chip Dream to address issues related to chip-building capacity. Elon Musk has secured $500 million for his AI start-up, xAI, which aims to integrate AI more into the X social media platform and other use cases. Intel joined forces with investment company Digital Bridge to create Articul8, a full-stack generative AI software platform. Former GitHub CEO Nat Friedman and entrepreneur Daniel Gross raised over $80M in a funding round for ElevenLabs, which aims to develop AI-powered audio tools. If you're interested in AI funding and investments, consider attending the ODSC East 2024 conference in April.

results_after_filter.title: Dopo ChatGPT i robot: ecco quello di OpenAI che mette a posto i piatti (video)
results_after_filter.snippet: OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, may soon go public with a valuation ranging from $80 to $100 billion. This is due to the AI boom sparked by ChatGPT. However, this might not be the end. Figure, a California-based startup, has collaborated with OpenAI to develop a robot called Figure 01. A video published on YouTube shows a human interacting with the robot, asking it to identify objects in a room. The robot identifies a red apple on a plate, a plate of snacks, and the human standing nearby with a hand on the table. The human asks if they can eat the apple, and the robot offers it. The human then introduces trash and asks the robot to explain why they gave them the apple and to pick up the trash. The robot picks up the trash while explaining the move with the apple: "I gave you the apple because it was the only edible item on the table." Finally, the human asks the robot what should happen next based on the plate placement. The robot suggests that the plate with the apple should be put in the snack plate. The human confirms the suggestion and asks the robot to do this, demonstrating impressive dexterity and precision in picking up the cup and flipping it before putting it back in its place. Another demonstration of precision follows when the robot places the plate in a designated compartment of the snack plate.

results_after_filter.title: Windows Copilot: GPT4-Turbo è disponibile gratis per gli utenti
results_after_filter.snippet: Microsoft has announced the availability of GPT4-Turbo for the free version of Windows Copilot, making it even more complete and efficient. The update is now available for free users of Copilot, who can now use GPT4-Turbo, the new language model at the base of the free version of Copilot, which is becoming more integrated into various Microsoft services. This announcement came from Mikhail Parakhin, head of the division responsible for Microsoft's web services. This is a new step forward in the development and diffusion of Copilot. Windows Copilot now uses GPT4-Turbo Users of the free version of Copilot now have the opportunity to use GPT4-Turbo, the new language model presented by OpenAI last fall and capable of generating longer texts (up to 300 pages per single prompt) with a greater understanding of requests and a knowledge base up to April 2023, to provide more up-to-date information. Note that Pro users will have the opportunity to continue using the previous model, activating the appropriate selector that allows you to switch from GPT4-Turbo to GPT4 based on their preferences. The transition to GPT4-Turbo for the free version of Copilot, in addition to improving performance for users, will allow for cost reduction. During the presentation of the new model, OpenAI had confirmed that Turbo was, on average, up to three times more economical for input tokens and up to twice

results_after_filter.title: MotoGP 24 annunciato per PC e console, le novità
results_after_filter.snippet: Milestone and MotoGP have announced MotoGP 24, the official MotoGP video game for the 2024 season, which will include MotoGP, Moto2, Moto3, and the FIM Enel MotoE Championship. The game will be released on May 2, 2024 on various platforms: PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and Steam. The game aims to reflect the real race experience with the introduction of new features such as dynamic weather, flag-to-flag races, a rider market, and the MotoGP Stewards to further approach the dynamics of the races. Significant changes such as Marc Márquez's move to the Gresini team with a Ducati will influence the game dynamics, with riders able to change teams, influencing each season with a different roster. The MotoGP Stewards will monitor the races and timed sessions, penalizing improper behavior on the track. This adds a level of realism to the rivalry between riders and career management. Milestone is committed to offering an optimal gaming experience with the introduction of an adaptive difficulty system, improvements to AI and physics, and a focus on tire management. The online section of the game includes LiveGP Championships, a competitive multiplayer mode with rankings, and support for cross-play and local split-screen. Custom helmet, sticker, race number, and helmet top edit

results_after_filter.title: Microsoft выпустит продукт Security AI
results_after_filter.snippet: Microsoft plans to release AI tools for cybersecurity professionals to analyze suspicious incidents and identify methods that hackers use to hide their intentions. Microsoft introduced its Security Copilot a year ago and has been testing it with corporate clients, including BP Plc and Dow Chemical Co. The company now counts 'hundreds of partners and customers', according to Andrew Conway, Microsoft's vice president of security marketing. Clients will pay a commission based on usage, just like with Azure cloud services. Security Copilot is part of Microsoft's ongoing efforts to fill its mainstream product lines with AI tools from partner OpenAI and persuade corporate clients to buy subscriptions. While AI can help generate content and synthesize corporate data, it also makes mistakes. Since computer security is so important and the risks are so high, Conway said that the software giant has taken special care with this assistant. The software combines the power of OpenAI's model with vast amounts of security information that Microsoft collects. "Given the seriousness of the use, we are taking a series of measures to eliminate risks," he said, including constantly gathering feedback on the product and identifying areas where it does not meet requirements. "Given the above, security is still a place where security products generate false-positive and false-negative results. This is the nature of the space." Copilot works with all of Microsoft's security software to provide an assistant panel that can compile data and answer questions. For example, one

results_after_filter.title: Osaic Welcomes Cohen Financial Services from Cetera Advisors
results_after_filter.snippet: Osaic, a leading provider of wealth management services, announced the successful recruitment of Cohen Financial Services, adding $165 million in client assets to Osaic's New Century Financial Group, bringing the total client assets to over $1 billion. Cohen Financial Services, founded in 1960, is based in Overland Park, Kansas, and provides a range of services including multi-generational financial planning, investment and risk management, retirement and estate planning, employee benefits, business succession strategies, and insurance services. The team, led by Jason Stewart, includes partners, financial advisors, and support staff. The addition of Cohen Financial Services brings the total number of financial advisors in New Century to 30.

results_after_filter.title: OpenAI Could Let Users Send Two Times Longer Prompts In GPT-4's Next Big Update, Leak Suggests
results_after_filter.snippet: OpenAI may have accidentally leaked information about an upcoming version of its AI chatbot, GPT 4.5 Turbo, with twice as many tokens as the current version, GPT-4 Turbo, announced in November. Users on Reddit reported that they were able to scoop up some details about ChatGPT 4.5 Turbo, which could be the next major update from Microsoft Corp.-backed MSFT OpenAI. These details were revealed by Microsoft's Bing, and DuckDuckGo search engines, which cached a copy of the GPT 4.5 Turbo announcement page on OpenAI's website. Users claim that the information revealed by these two search engines suggests that OpenAI has two major updates in store for the next version of GPT. The new model can generate natural language or code with a context window of 256k tokens and has a knowledge cutoff date of June 2024. The leaked GPT-4.5 Turbo details reveal that the limit has been doubled to 256,000 tokens from ChatGPT 3.5's limit of 8,000, while GPT-4 Turbo's "Enterprise" version has a limit of 128,000 tokens. However, the knowledge cutoff date is June 2024, which is still over two months away, meaning GPT-4.5 Turbo might not be released until at least June. The increased competition

results_before_filter.title: El regreso triunfal: "Kung Fu Panda 4" arrasa en la taquilla en tiempo récord
results_before_filter.snippet: Kung Fu Panda 4, one of the most anticipated animated films of 2024, has received a 75% approval rating from critics on the film review portal Rotten Tomatoes after 48 reviews. The film has grossed over $100 million worldwide, $70 million in the US and Canada, and $30 million in the rest of the world, surpassing its production costs and becoming the highest-grossing film in the Kung Fu Panda franchise at its opening. The film follows Po, the Dragon Warrior, who is called by destiny to become the spiritual leader of the Peace Valley. However, Po's lack of leadership skills and his need to find and train a new Dragon Warrior quickly presents a challenge. Kung Fu Panda 4 will be released in Colombian cinemas on March 14, 2024, making it one of the first Hollywood films to hit theaters this year.

results_before_filter.title: Where are AI Investments Going in 2024?
results_before_filter.snippet: Several major companies are investing heavily in AI in 2024. Meta, led by Mark Zuckerberg, has invested $10 billion into computing infrastructure in pursuit of artificial general intelligence. Microsoft is investing over $2 billion into French startup Mistral to expand its AI capabilities. Amazon, Microsoft, OpenAI, and Nvidia are backing a startup that aims to develop human-like robots. OpenAI's CEO, Sam Altman, is raising up to $7 trillion for Chip Dream to address issues related to chip-building capacity. Elon Musk has secured $500 million for his AI start-up, xAI, which aims to integrate AI more into the X social media platform and other use cases. Intel joined forces with investment company Digital Bridge to create Articul8, a full-stack generative AI software platform. Former GitHub CEO Nat Friedman and entrepreneur Daniel Gross raised over $80M in a funding round for ElevenLabs, which aims to develop AI-powered audio tools. If you're interested in AI funding and investments, consider attending the ODSC East 2024 conference in April.

A video published on YouTube shows a human interacting with the robot, asking it to identify objects in a room. The robot identifies a red apple on a plate, a plate of snacks, and the human standing nearby with a hand on the table. The human asks if they can eat the apple, and the robot offers it. The human then introduces trash and asks the robot to explain why they gave them the apple and to pick up the trash. The robot picks up the trash while explaining the move with the apple: "I gave you the apple because it was the only edible item on the table." Finally, the human asks the robot what should happen next based on the plate placement. The robot suggests that the plate with the apple should be put in the snack plate. The human confirms the suggestion and asks the robot to do this, demonstrating impressive dexterity and precision in picking up the cup and flipping it before putting it back in its place. Another demonstration of precision follows when the robot places the plate in a designated compartment of the snack plate.

results_before_filter.title: MotoGP 24 annunciato per PC e console, le novità
results_before_filter.snippet: Milestone and MotoGP have announced MotoGP 24, the official MotoGP video game for the 2024 season, which will include MotoGP, Moto2, Moto3, and the FIM Enel MotoE Championship. The game will be released on May 2, 2024 on various platforms: PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and Steam. The game aims to reflect the real race experience with the introduction of new features such as dynamic weather, flag-to-flag races, a rider market, and the MotoGP Stewards to further approach the dynamics of the races. Significant changes such as Marc Márquez's move to the Gresini team with a Ducati will influence the game dynamics, with riders able to change teams, influencing each season with a different roster. The MotoGP Stewards will monitor the races and timed sessions, penalizing improper behavior on the track. This adds a level of realism to the rivalry between riders and career management. Milestone is committed to offering an optimal gaming experience with the introduction of an adaptive difficulty system, improvements to AI and physics, and a focus on tire management. The online section of the game includes LiveGP Championships, a competitive multiplayer mode with rankings, and support for cross-play and local split-screen. results_before_filter.title: Microsoft выпустит продукт Security AI
results_before_filter.snippet: Microsoft plans to release AI tools for cybersecurity professionals to analyze suspicious incidents and identify methods that hackers use to hide their intentions. Microsoft introduced its Security Copilot a year ago and has been testing it with corporate clients, including BP Plc and Dow Chemical Co. The company now counts 'hundreds of partners and customers', according to Andrew Conway, Microsoft's vice president of security marketing. Clients will pay a commission based on usage, just like with Azure cloud services. Security Copilot is part of Microsoft's ongoing efforts to fill its mainstream product lines with AI tools from partner OpenAI and persuade corporate clients to buy subscriptions. While AI can help generate content and synthesize corporate data, it also makes mistakes. Since computer security is so important and the risks are so high, Conway said that the software giant has taken special care with this assistant. The software combines the power of OpenAI's model with vast amounts of security information that Microsoft collects. "Given the seriousness of the use, we are taking a series of measures to eliminate risks," he said, including constantly gathering feedback on the product and identifying areas where it does not meet requirements. "Given the above, security is still a place where security products generate false-positive and false-negative results. This is the nature of the space." results_before_filter.title: Osaic Welcomes Cohen Financial Services from Cetera Advisors
results_before_filter.snippet: Osaic, a leading provider of wealth management services, announced the successful recruitment of Cohen Financial Services, adding $165 million in client assets to Osaic's New Century Financial Group, bringing the total client assets to over $1 billion. Cohen Financial Services, founded in 1960, is based in Overland Park, Kansas, and provides a range of services including multi-generational financial planning, investment and risk management, retirement and estate planning, employee benefits, business succession strategies, and insurance services. The team, led by Jason Stewart, includes partners, financial advisors, and support staff. The addition of Cohen Financial Services brings the total number of financial advisors in New Century to 30.

results_before_filter.title: OpenAI Could Let Users Send Two Times Longer Prompts In GPT-4's Next Big Update, Leak Suggests
results_before_filter.snippet: OpenAI may have accidentally leaked information about an upcoming version of its AI chatbot, GPT 4.5 Turbo, with twice as many tokens as the current version, GPT-4 Turbo, announced in November. Users on Reddit reported that they were able to scoop up some details about ChatGPT 4.5 Turbo, which could be the next major update from Microsoft Corp.-backed MSFT OpenAI. These details were revealed by Microsoft's Bing, and DuckDuckGo search engines, which cached a copy of the GPT 4.5 Turbo announcement page on OpenAI's website. Users claim that the information revealed by these two search engines suggests that OpenAI has two major updates in store for the next version of GPT. The new model can generate natural language or code with a context window of 256k tokens and has a knowledge cutoff date of June 2024. The leaked GPT-4.5 Turbo details reveal that the limit has been doubled to 256,000 tokens from ChatGPT 3.5's limit of 8,000, while GPT-4 Turbo's "Enterprise" version has a limit of 128,000 tokens. However, the knowledge cutoff date is June 2024, which is still over two months away, meaning GPT-4.5 Turbo might not be released until at least June. The increased competition

The film follows Po, the Dragon Warrior, who is called by destiny to become the spiritual leader of the Peace Valley. However, Po's lack of leadership skills and his need to find and train a new Dragon Warrior quickly presents a challenge. Kung Fu Panda 4 will be released in Colombian cinemas on March 14, 2024, making it one of the first Hollywood films to hit theaters this year.

results_before_filter.title: FED FAİZ TOPLPANTI TARİHİ 2024: ABD Merkez Bankası FED faizi açıklandı mı, ne zaman açıklanacak, ne olur?
results_before_filter.snippet: The Federal Reserve (FED) has kept the interest rate at 5.50% in its latest meeting, as announced on September 17-18, 2024. The decision was made with unanimous approval from the FOMC. The FED has stated that it will not reduce the interest rate until it has more confidence that inflation is heading towards its 2% target. Market analysts and investors are closely following the FED's decision, with some expecting a rate cut and others anticipating a hold. According to the FED, the decision will be announced on the evening of September 18, 2024.

results_before_filter.title: FED FAİZ KARARI EYLÜL 2024! FED faiz beklentisi ne yönde? Dolar, altın...
results_before_filter.snippet: The Federal Reserve (FED) has decided to keep the interest rate unchanged. According to the statement, the decision was made with unanimous vote. The statement also mentioned that the recent indicators show that the economic activity is continuing to expand at a strong pace. However, it was noted that the employment growth has slowed down, and the unemployment rate has increased, but remains low. The statement also mentioned that the inflation has decreased, but still remains high. It was said, 'A bit more progress has been made towards the Committee's 2% inflation target in recent months.' The statement reiterated that the long-term goal is to achieve maximum employment and an inflation rate of 2%. It was also stated that the risks to achieving these targets are moving in a better direction. However, the statement emphasized that the economic outlook is uncertain, and the Federal Open Market Committee is cautious about the risks to both targets. To support the targets, the target range for the federal funds rate has been set at 5.25-5.50%.

results_before_filter.title: Inflación sigue sin llegar a meta de Reserva Federal
results_before_filter.snippet: Investors, analysts, and markets are looking for reasons to push the Federal Reserve to reduce its interest rate from the current level of 5.25%-5.50%. However, the reality is that the Federal Reserve's goal is not to reach 3%, but 2%, and it should have been achieved several months ago. The recent job creation and unemployment rate of 4.3% were seen as reasons to pressure the Federal Reserve to hold an emergency meeting to lower its interest rate by 0.5 percentage points immediately. However, the latest inflation data, including the 2.9% consumer price index and 3.2% core inflation rate, indicate that inflation is under control and the Federal Reserve may lower its interest rate in September. However, the author believes that the Federal Reserve will not lower its interest rate in September due to geopolitical uncertainty and the fact that the inflation rate is still above 3%. The author also mentions that the upcoming US presidential election could influence inflation and that the Federal Reserve may decide to wait until November to lower its interest rate. results_before_filter.title: US-Notenbank Fed entscheidet über Leitzinsen - erneut keine Senkung erwartet
results_before_filter.snippet: The US Federal Reserve (Fed) will announce its decision on interest rates on Wednesday at 14:00 local time (20:00 CEST). Following the announcement, Fed Chairman Jerome Powell will hold a press conference to discuss the results of the central bank's meeting. Observers expect hints of a potential interest rate cut in September. However, the rates are expected to remain stable between 5.25% and 5.5%, the highest level in over 20 years. The Fed has promised interest rate cuts this year, but has also emphasized the need to avoid acting too quickly to prevent inflation from rising again. The recent trend has been positive, with inflation falling to 3.0% in June, while economic growth and the labor market have remained strong.

results_before_filter.title: The Federal Reserve will make an interest rate decision this week. Here's what to expect.
results_before_filter.snippet: The Federal Reserve is set to make an interest rate decision this week, with economists predicting a rate cut in September. The Fed's current interest rate is 5.25-5.5%, and most economists expect it to remain unchanged until September. The rate cut is expected to be 0.25 percentage points, trimming the benchmark rate to 5-5.25%. The Fed's decision is based on its dual mandate to keep prices stable and ensure maximum employment. Inflation has cooled, and the labor market is slowing, which could lead to a rate cut. A rate cut could bring relief to borrowers, with mortgage rates potentially trending toward 6% by the end of the year.

According to analysts, the FED's decision will be influenced by the slowing down of economic activity and the expected decrease in inflation. The FED's interest rate decision is expected to be announced on July 31, and analysts believe that there is an 80% chance of a second interest rate cut in December.
